trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the collection of checked items, including items in an indeterminate state, in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將已選取項目的集合 (包括處於不定狀態的項目) 封裝至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The checked items collection is a subset of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control; it contains only those items that are in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目集合是中的所有項目子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項等控制項，它只包含這些項目處於已核取或是不定狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control).
trans-unit.target: 下表是控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中項目的索引集合的範例。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Check State
trans-unit.target: 核取狀態

trans-unit.source: object 1
trans-unit.target: object 1

trans-unit.source: object 2
trans-unit.target: 物件 2

trans-unit.source: object 3
trans-unit.target: 物件 3

trans-unit.source: object 4
trans-unit.target: 物件 4

trans-unit.source: object 5
trans-unit.target: 物件 5

trans-unit.source: Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of the checked items.
trans-unit.target: 根據上一個範例下, 表顯示選取項目的索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: object 2
trans-unit.target: 物件 2

trans-unit.source: object 4
trans-unit.target: 物件 4

trans-unit.source: object 5
trans-unit.target: 物件 5

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.Item%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>類別有兩個成員，可讓您存取預存的索引，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.Item%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Based on the previous example, a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.Item%2A> property with a parameter value of 1 returns object 4.
trans-unit.target: 根據上述範例中，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.Item%2A>參數值為 1 的屬性會傳回物件 4。

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> with a parameter of object 4 returns a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>4 會傳回物件的參數值為 1。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法，以設定項目的核取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: An object from the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的項目是否位於集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if item is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目在集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines if an object from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷將物件從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>集合處於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based relative index in <c>dest</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>dest</c> 中以零起始的相對索引，即開始複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.
trans-unit.target: 將整個集合複製到現有陣列中的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素數目大於從索引至目的端 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 結尾的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數目

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回列舉值，可用來逐一查看 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for navigating through the list.
trans-unit.target: 用來巡覽清單的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The object whose index you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 您想要擷取其索引的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object must belong to the checked items collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件必須屬於已選取項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an index into the collection of checked items.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已選取項目集合內的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the object in the checked item collection or -1 if the object is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 已選取項目集合中物件的索引，或者為 –1 (如果物件不在集合之中)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 類別概觀中的範例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only items that are checked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>集合是在物件子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>集合，表示已核取項目。

trans-unit.source: This collection is ordered in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會以遞增順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An index into the collection of checked items.
trans-unit.target: 已選取項目集合內的索引。

trans-unit.source: This collection index corresponds to the index of the checked item.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合索引對應已選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object in the checked items collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得已選取項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 類別概觀中的範例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only items that are checked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>集合是在物件子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>集合，表示已核取項目。

trans-unit.source: This collection is ordered in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會以遞增順序排序。

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 物件無法設定。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> used to synchronize to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步處理集合的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之項目的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Clear" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Clear" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>value</c> 之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The item to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
